snippet: The State Supreme Court ruled on Monday that students and employees with concealed weapon permits can carry handguns on University of Colorado campuses.
abstract: Colorado State Supreme Court rules that students and employees with concealed weapon permits can carry handguns on the University of Colorado campuses, overturning a ban by the school’s regents.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court ruled on Monday that students and employees with concealed weapon permits can carry handguns on University of Colorado campuses.

headline.main: Colorado: Court Lifts Campus Gun Ban
headline.print_headline: Colorado: Court Lifts Campus Gun Ban
